results.title: Ingenuity lessons being incorporated into Mars Sample Return
results.summary: As a Mars helicopter continues to operate far past expectations, lessons from that vehicle are being incorporated into NASAâ€™s evolving Mars Sample Return plans.

results.title: ULA Ready for Inaugural Vulcan Flight
results.summary: United Launch Alliance (ULA) is preparing for the inaugural flight of its new Vulcan rocket from Space Launch Complex (SLC) 41 at the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida. Liftoff is currently scheduled for Jan. 8, 2023, at 2:18 AM EST (07:18 UTC).

results.title: More Than Just LEO: A Framework for SPD-8 and Space Critical Infrastructure
results.summary: The current debate over whether to weight space critical infrastructure on its impact on terrestrial activity overlooks most deep space activity.
